thread.section_title: Nutrisystem Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nutrisystem | nutrisystem.com | 2 of 84
thread.title: Tenly Connor

author: Tenly Connor
title: Tenly Connor
text: The food is great. I rarely feel hungry. I have lots of options. Staff is always helpful. I used Nutrisystem before and lost weight but fell off the wagon. It was my own fault for not monitoring my weight and food during the transition. Nutrisystem is learning how to eat so when you start choosing food, you choose healthy low calorie foods and learn to add mostly vegetables! Love Nutrisystem
